data.title: Chloe de Gervaise

data.text:
Summary

Chloe de Gervaise is one of the five main playable characters in Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold: The Fafnir Knight.

Chloe is a distant relative of Bertrand, and grew up in his company. When Bertrand left on his travels, Chloe came with him. This led to them both ending up at Ginnungagap, where they met The Fafnir Knight, Flavio, and Arianna.

Chloe is of the War Magus class. She specialises in both healing her allies, and weakening enemies with ailments. Enemies with ailments already on them can be weakened further with War Edge skills.

Powers and Stats

Tier: High 7-A

Name: Chloe de Gervaise

Origin: Etrian Odyssey

Gender: Female

Age: Unspecified. Likely under 15

Classification: Human War Magus

Powers and Abilities: Superhuman Physical Characteristics, Healing (War Heal), Resurrection (War Revive), Weapon Mastery (swords and staffs), Regeneration (with Artery skill. Effect is Mid-Low), Statistics Amplification (Warmight and Rockskin), Status Effect Inducement (Random Disease). More with Grimoire Stones.

Attack Potency: Large Mountain level (can damage the Storm Emperor)

Speed: Massively Hypersonic (can avoid The Overlord's skill Crashing Thunder, which is similar to Cloud to Ground lighting)

Lifting Strength: Unknown

Striking Strength: Large Mountain level

Durability: Large Mountain level (can take hits from the Storm Emperor)

Stamina: Superhuman (Can last several days in the labyrinth without resting)

Range: Standard Melee Range; higher with War Lore skills.

Standard Equipment: Sword or Staff.

Intelligence: Gifted (Has above average knowledge of medicine and War Lore)

Weaknesses: Tends to rely on her teammates to fight effectively

Notable Attacks/Techniques: See the page for the War Magus on the Etrian Odyssey Wiki.

Notable Matchups

Victories:

Losses:
